title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.183 - Materiality
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.183 - Materiality

State Regulations
(a) The relative
importance, when measured against a standard of comparison, of any item
included in or omitted from books of account or financial statements, or of any
procedure or change in procedure that conceivably might affect such
statements. (b) The characteristic
attaching to a statement, fact or item whereby its disclosure or the method of
giving it expression would be likely to influence the judgment of a reasonable
person. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.183

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
